location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 146 to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter gives thanks for news regarding the recent takeover of Bussora [Basra] by Sheik Twiney [Shaikh Thuwayni] and the positive attitude shown by him towards the company. The letter reports that the deposed Ottoman Governor was not permitted to land at Bushire.
